channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M62
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M62

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: link road from M62 J35 eastbound to M18 J7 southbound | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M62 eastbound exit slip at junction J35 , minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: link road from M62 J35 eastbound to M18 J7 southbound | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M62 eastbound exit slip at junction J35 is closed , due to roadworks. Road expected to re-open from 3:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: link road from M62 J35 westbound to M18 J7 southbound | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M62 westbound exit slip at junction J35 , minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M62 eastbound between J27 and J28 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M62 eastbound between junctions J27 and J28, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks closing two lanes. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M62 eastbound between J32A and J33 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M62 eastbound between junctions J32A and J33, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing two lanes. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M62 eastbound between J34 and J35 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M62 eastbound between junctions J34 and J35, minor delays can be expected at peak times due to roadworks closing one lane, between 9:30 am and 3 pm, from 3 February 2011 to 22 November 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M62 eastbound between J25 and J26 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M62 eastbound between junctions J25 and J26, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 6:00 am on 24 March 2013.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M62 eastbound between J27 and J28 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M62 eastbound between junctions J27 and J28, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 6:00 am on 21 January 2013.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M62 J24 westbound access | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M62 westbound entry slip at junction J24 will be closed due to roadworks, from 8 pm on 3 October 2011 to 6 am on 4 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: link road from M57 southbound to M62 J6 eastbound | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M62 eastbound entry slip at junction J6 will be closed due to roadworks, between 10 pm and 5 am, from 3 October 2011 to 7 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M62 eastbound between J37 and J38 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M62 eastbound will be closed between junctions J37 and J38 due to carriageway resurfacing, between 8 pm and 6 am, from 3 October 2011 to 7 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M62 J37 eastbound access | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M62 eastbound entry slip at junction J37 , expect delays of up to 10 mins at peak times due to carriageway resurfacing , between 8 pm and 6 am, from 3 October 2011 to 7 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M62 J28 eastbound exit | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M62 eastbound exit slip at junction J28 will be closed due to roadworks, between 8 pm and 6 am, from 3 October 2011 to 4 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M62 westbound between J30 and J29 | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M62 westbound between junctions J30 and J25, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 6:00 am on 21 January 2013.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M62 eastbound between J29 and J30 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M62 eastbound between junctions J29 and J30, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 6:00 am on 19 July 2013.
